findings.rationale: A five-year duration may be excessive for certain types of information, potentially leading to unforeseen obligations and liabilities.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond can expose the Receiving Party to significant risks if the Disclosing Party's claims are unfounded.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment without consent may hinder business operations, especially in mergers or acquisitions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
